messages.error: :x: **|** An unexpected error occured. Please check the logs for details.
messages.invalid-article-id: :x: **|** Unable to find article. Please select a value from the list or use the `/search` command.
messages.no-results: :mag_right: **|** No search results found for `{{query, escape-markdown}}` in `{{column}}` column.
messages.cooldown: :hourglass_flowing_sand: **|** Please wait {{duration, duration}} before executing this command again.

commands.article: Display information about a single article.
commands.article-query: Title or flight number/registration to find article by
commands.refetch: Refetch all data. Note that changes may take a few minutes to appear.

search.matches: Showing matches for `{{query, escape-markdown}}` in `{{column}}` column.

about.title: About
about.description:
A bot to search through all published articles of Admiral Cloudberg.

- Use the /random command to retrieve a random article.
- Use the /article command to find a specific article by title or flight number.
- Use the /search command to search all articles.
